statements: SELECT * FROM legislators;
SELECT full_name, party_affiliation FROM legislators;
SELECT legislator_id, contact_email FROM legislators WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican';
SELECT full_name, district_number FROM legislators ORDER BY district_number ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE voting_record ->> 'policy' = 'pro';
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic';
SELECT full_name, contact_email FROM legislators WHERE district_number = 5 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT full_name, district_number, voting_record->'bills_voted' AS bills_voted FROM legislators WHERE district_number IN (3, 6) ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT full_name, contact_phone FROM legislators WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican' AND voting_record->>'last_vote_date' > '2022-01-01';
SELECT legislator_id, full_name, district_number FROM legislators WHERE contact_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM legislators;
SELECT legislator_name, contact_info FROM legislators;
SELECT legislator_name, contact_info FROM legislators WHERE legislator_id = 123;
SELECT legislator_name, vote_result FROM legislators JOIN voting_records ON legislators.legislator_id = voting_records.legislator_id;
SELECT * FROM voting_records WHERE vote_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE legislator_id = 1;
SELECT legislator_name, contact_info FROM legislators WHERE legislator_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_records WHERE vote_result = 'Yes';
SELECT * FROM voting_records ORDER BY vote_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT legislator_name, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM legislators l JOIN voting_records v ON l.legislator_id = v.legislator_id GROUP BY l.legislator_id ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM legislators;
SELECT nicename, state, party FROM legislators WHERE state='California';
SELECT * FROM contacts ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT nicename, party FROM legislators WHERE party='Republican' AND state='Texas';
SELECT legislator_nicename, political_party, vote_decision FROM voting_records WHERE political_party='Democrat';
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE state='California' ORDER BY party DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT nicename, party FROM legislators WHERE party='Democratic' AND state='New York';
SELECT * FROM contacts WHERE phone='123-456-7890' OR email='john.doe@gmail.com';

SELECT contacts.email, voting_records.vote_decision FROM contacts JOIN voting_records ON contacts.legislator_nicename=voting_records.legislator_nicename WHERE voting_records.political_party='Republican';

SELECT legislators.nicename, voting_records.vote_decision FROM legislators LEFT JOIN voting_records ON legislators.nicename=voting_records.legislator_nicename WHERE voting_records.vote_decision='Yes' ORDER BY legislators.nicename ASC;
SELECT * FROM legislators;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM legislators ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT email FROM legislators WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM voting_records WHERE vote_decision = 'Yes';
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM advocacy_groups;
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM legislators WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM voting_records ORDER BY vote_date DESC;

SELECT legislators.first_name, advocacy_groups.group_name FROM legislators JOIN group_legislators ON legislators.id = group_legislators.legislator_id JOIN advocacy_groups ON group_legislators.group_id = advocacy_groups.group_id;
SELECT AVG(length(email)) AS average_email_length FROM legislators;
SELECT * FROM legislators;
SELECT full_name, party, state FROM legislators WHERE party = 'Democrat';
SELECT legislator_id, district FROM legislators WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM voting_records WHERE vote_result = TRUE ORDER BY vote_date DESC;
SELECT target_name, target_description, issue_area FROM advocacy_targets;
SELECT * FROM legislators WHERE state = 'California' AND party = 'Democratic';
SELECT full_name, email FROM legislators WHERE district = 5 ORDER BY full_name ASC;
SELECT party, COUNT(*) AS total_legislators FROM legislators GROUP BY party;
SELECT l.full_name, v.vote_date, v.bill_number, v.vote_result FROM legislators l JOIN voting_records v ON l.legislator_id = v.legislator_id WHERE v.vote_result = TRUE ORDER BY v.vote_date DESC;

SELECT a.target_name, a.issue_area, COUNT(*) AS total_actions FROM advocacy_targets a JOIN advocacy_actions aa ON a.target_id = aa.target_id GROUP BY a.target_name, a.issue_area ORDER BY total_actions DESC;
